Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -2,10 +2,11 @@ export const Header = () => { return (
-

Internship Offer

-

Enhance your learning experience with an exciting Internship Offer at leading companies. This internship will provide you hands-on experience with real-world projects, improving your skills and building your professional network. Join our internship program to apply your learning, gain practical exposure, and kickstart your career in web development.

+

Become a Tutor

+

Are you an expert in your field and passionate about sharing knowledge? Join our platform and Become a Tutor. This opportunity allows you to teach, mentor, and inspire students while gaining valuable teaching experience. By becoming a tutor, you'll have the chance to help others succeed while enhancing your own skills and building your reputation.

) \ No newline at end of file } - + +

Offering Job Opportunities to Our Students

-

Are you an expert in your field and passionate about sharing knowledge? Join our platform and Become a Tutor. This opportunity allows you to teach, mentor, and inspire students while gaining valuable teaching experience. By becoming a tutor, you'll have the chance to help others succeed while enhancing your own skills and building your reputation.

+

At SkillsEducation, we are committed to helping our students build successful careers. We offer a variety of job opportunities across different industries, connecting our graduates with top employers. Whether you're looking for an internship, part-time, or full-time position, we are here to assist you in finding a job that matches your skills and aspirations.
